version_description:
• Filter by lot size to only see the types of lots that match your business needs
• Copy and paste text from the app (e.g., UPC codes) in order to easily research products
• Email manifests from the app to save for later or share with business partners
• View your order history and keep track of inventory
• Design enhancements and minor bug fixes

• Sort and filter on the My Lots screen
• View detailed manifest condition notes for Scratch & Dent and Salvage lots
• Report issues and bugs directly from the app
• Also includes design enhancements and minor bug fixes
Bug fix for crashes on All Lots and My Lots views

• Get push notifications as soon as your orders are shipped
• Set lot size preferences for new inventory push notifications
• Sort manifest data for easy on-the-go research
• Also includes design enhancements and minor bug fixes
Design enhancements and minor bug fixes
Design enhancements and minor bug fixes

- ASINs in the manifest that link to Amazon to easily research products
- Filter and sort by lots that have reduced in price
- Design enhancements and minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes and design enhancements.
Minor bug fixes
Performance and stability enhancements
Sales tax will no longer be applied to orders shipped to the state of Maryland.

- A new filter type - "contains master pack" - to more easily find lots that contain master pack inventory
- Minor bug fixes
Minor performance enhancements.

Stock images are now available for products in the manifest
Track the status of your order to know exactly when your lots will be delivered
Set shipping, billing, and payment method defaults for a faster and better checkout experience

Updated filters to show lots eligible for shipping discounts.
Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Design improvements to how prices are displayed.
This update includes bug fixes.

Now you can search and browse by subcategories.
Log in via Touch ID.
Performance enhancements
Auctions are now in the BULQ App! You can now bid on a large selection of lots across all categories and conditions right from your phone.
Bug fixes.
Updates to reflect that BULQ is a registered mark of Optoro, Inc. (c) 2018.

Deeplinks added for auctions won and auctions lost notifications to the appropriate lot pages.
Minor bug fixes and design enhancements.
Updated terms and service during account creation.
Updates to support deeplinks and performance improvements.
Updated notification systems
Customers can now provide in-app reviews about their mobile experience, accessible on “Browse My Lots” and order confirmation pages.

Updated linking that enables URLs for account details, order details and auctions to be automatically opened in the app when accessed on a mobile device.
Updated sales tax language.
Bug fixes on watchlist.

Updated linking that enables URLs for order details to be automatically opened in the app when accessed on a mobile device
Manifest updates
-Updated lot details language
-Item photos now displayed in a carousel on lot details page
Bug fixes

Updated linking that enables URLs for order details to be automatically opened in the app when accessed on a mobile device
Manifest updates
-Updated lot details language
-Item photos now displayed in a carousel on lot details page
Bug fixes

Updated search capabilities including:
-Search access on multiple navigation screens
-Access to new search screens via the search icon
Updated applied filters to appear as tags at the top of the screen
Bug fixes for Apple Pay

Fix to the “Report an Issue” button
Users can now receive in-app messages about promos and other content

Users can now select which of the 4 notification types they’d like to receive
Update to “My Lots” preferences to include second level inventory categories
Bug fixes

Users can now select which of the 4 notification types they’d like to receive
Update to “My Lots” preferences to include second level inventory categories
Bug fixes

We’ve redesigned our homepage to further improve your sourcing experience. Homepage features now include:
• Browse by Category
• My Lots
• Current promotions or sales
• Cases under $150
• Pallets under $600
Bug Fixes
iOS 13 compatibility bug fixes
New warehouse filters: users can now browse lots by warehouse location

• Introducing BULQ’s new pallet shipping experience! Users can now enjoy two pallet shipping updates:
• Calculated shipping: Pallet shipping costs will now be determined using a lot’s weight and final destination. Applies ONLY to pallets; cases will continue to ship for a flat rate of $30/case.
• Multi-pallet savings: Customers purchasing 2-6 pallets from the same warehouse will receive shipping savings on their order. Savings will be reflected in Cart.
• Exact shipping rates can be viewed on a pallet’s “Lot Details” page and when added to Cart.
Minor bug fixes

BULQ’s new pallet shipping experience! Users can now enjoy two pallet shipping updates:
• Calculated shipping: Pallet shipping costs determined using a lot’s weight and final destination. Applies ONLY to pallets; cases will continue to ship for a flat rate of $30/case.
• Multi-pallet savings: Purchasing 2-6 pallets from the same warehouse receives shipping savings on their order
Exact shipping rates can be viewed on a pallet’s “Lot Details” page.
